articles.description: Florida OL Clay Wedin and Texas DB Jaylon Braxton both committed to Michigan State on Tuesday.
articles.content: Michigan State is making the most of its official visits, landing five four-star prospects since the month began. Two of those five committed Tuesday, with Florida OL Clay Wedin and Texas DB Jaylon B… [+365 chars]
